channel.title: Shop Problem [Help Please]
channel.description:
[code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 1052 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:118) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]
That's what I get when I runserver, when I compile, no errors. It happens in almost every shop I try to add, what's the problem?

item.title: Shop Problem [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Not sure, but it might be because when adding shop keepers to the autospawn, they have to be with itehr shop keepers, if they are in the middle of a bunc of monsters, then they wont work, so ifs its like
spawn=mosnter
spawn=shopkeeper
spawn=monster, it usualy doesnt work, at least for me

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Problem [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 1052 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:118) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)

That’s what I get when I runserver, when I compile, no errors. It happens in almost every shop I try to add, what’s the problem?

Read full topic
